choices: Owner's Choice (will be 18+ so I have no restrictions :3)
1.content:
Here's where the stories will be broken up...IF anyone wants to join in. This is the passage to a random story, what you see in front of you are roads, roads, and roads that never seem to end but never start in the beginning. Some even have colors much like the Yellow Brick Road, without the bricks. Some don't even start from the "middle". That and some have ninjas walking down them with wingless-flying pigs, while others tend to have cats that breathe in water that breaks the sense of science, since you can walk into it and it stands with nothing making it.
Well before I break out saying anything bad, laughing, or making any jokes. Decide which path to take.

WHAT IS YOUR PATH?
1.title: Infinite Road

11.content:
There is 4 paths that appear before you, three you feel inside of you lead to one eventual meeting point, though you don't know how or why but you do. As for the other road... well, it so... err--bright? Colorful? Uh...colorfully bright it screams unexpected. Anyway tearing your eyes away from said road leading somewhere that didn't exist moments before as you walked said path like 20 seconds ago.

To your left, is a path barely illuminated had the feeling of a dark maybe horror feeling, something that had no set words to describe but still felt as if hope was at the end of it.

In the middle, is a path that is quite bright but extremely unsettling so, a path that you feel must lead somewhere that it doesn't want to lead, a path of turns.

To your right, is path that has both feelings of the two that doesn't leave any distinct feeling or feeling of ending.

Finally, the nightmare ro---I mean... totally normal road! Yeah, let's go with that. A path of uncertain endings, madness and insanity as well as calm and sanity existing in one place. Neither really dominate nor subtle, quite scary to think about but I guess that's what they call random.
11.title: Three Choices, One Destiny & 1 Random Story

111.content:
A/N: Dark story ahead! Oh and slight prologue to the full story soon to be finished when I'm not busy.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- --------------------
    "When will you quit, human?"
    "When you die, traitor."
    "Kehhehheh!! Traitor, huh? What a funny notion! To think that I could be a traitor after all I've done."
    "Don't give me those lies. Because of you the people that came to care about me, for me, and I care for back--..."
    "But how could I ever want to hurt them, me?"
    "I don't know either. However, I won't let you leave this alive. I have all the proof I need to know someone like you should be burning in hell! My father, my adoptive father, your own brother is currently in the hospital DEAD and my mate almost near death. For years I trusted you, respected you, and you do this to them as well as almost put me in the same position as my father. I thought it couldn't have been you. Now I know the truth...you will pay!"
    "Heh. To think my student would try to harm me, convict me, and try to kill me. I've never been so proud to see my student isn't lacking in the brains department. Shame...I will have to severely punish you for this. Guess I will have to find a new student after I tear you limb from limb."
    --------

(Will write rest tomorrow [later today] or day after [tomorrow])
111.title: The Mercanary in the New World

choices: Yours truly follows the mild mannered way.
Yours truly goes into the superhero business.
114.content:
Once upon a time in an animated world circa the 1950's, yours truly an animated anthropomorphic kitten who starred in 2 Warner Bros. animated shorts kidding the kitten and a peck o' trouble was in Malibu California U.S.A. as I was consuming some highly radioactive cookie dough until I finished it all off and let out a burp or belch.

"Burp, excuse me." I said.

But after I belched, that's when it happened as I transformed into a 100 ft tall cookie dough monster that was looming over some buildings and whatnot in Malibu California itself as I looked over my body as I realized I was now a giant dough monster.

"You know I may as well get used to being a giant cookie dough monster since I'm still one of the good guys, but now that i'm a giant dough monster what am I going to do?" I said.

Immediately an idea or two came to mind as I could always be a mild mannered giant dough monster or I could be a giant cookie dough monster like superhero of sorts.
114.title: The adventures of the Cookie Dough Kitten.

info.description:
...I got bored...

THIS IS A MULTI-STORY(something I made up) HERE'S WHAT IT IS POSSIBLY:
♦Stories that have or eventually mix together (Characters or Plots)
♦Stories that have nothing to do with plots but will have other's characters in it at random.
♦Random stories that have nothing to do with each other
♦A mix of things above
♦+ more

ANYONE CAN ADD!! but...
♦Don't have such a short chapter. (A paragraph or...well anything more than 2 sentences unless needed)
♦Have fun
♦Please be descriptive as possible & help others out!

Go with it!

HOPE YOU LIKE IT! ♥
